name: HIPAA Security Rule Framework
description: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act Security Rule framework for protecting electronic protected health information (ePHI).

framework.name: HIPAA Security Rule Framework
framework.description: Framework for HIPAA Security Rule compliance covering Administrative, Physical, and Technical Safeguards

structure.title: Administrative Safeguards
structure.description: Administrative actions, policies, and procedures to manage security measures

items.title: Security Management Process
items.description: Implement policies and procedures to prevent, detect, contain, and correct security violations
questions: Is there a formal security management process?
Are policies regularly reviewed and updated?

items.title: Risk Analysis (Required)
items.description: Conduct an accurate and thorough assessment of potential risks and vulnerabilities

items.title: Risk Management (Required)
items.description: Implement security measures to reduce risks and vulnerabilities

items.title: Sanction Policy (Required)
items.description: Apply appropriate sanctions against workforce members who fail to comply

items.title: Information System Activity Review (Required)
items.description: Implement procedures to regularly review system activity

items.title: Assigned Security Responsibility
items.description: Identify the security official responsible for developing and implementing security policies
questions: Is there a designated security official?

items.title: Workforce Security
items.description: Implement policies and procedures to ensure appropriate access to ePHI

items.title: Authorization and/or Supervision (Addressable)
items.description: Implement procedures for authorization and supervision of workforce members

items.title: Workforce Clearance Procedure (Addressable)
items.description: Implement procedures to determine appropriate access levels

items.title: Termination Procedures (Addressable)
items.description: Implement procedures for terminating access when employment ends

items.title: Security Awareness and Training
items.description: Implement a security awareness and training program for all workforce members
questions: Is security training provided to all staff?

items.title: Security Reminders (Addressable)
items.description: Periodic security updates

items.title: Protection from Malicious Software (Addressable)
items.description: Procedures for guarding against and detecting malicious software

items.title: Log-in Monitoring (Addressable)
items.description: Procedures for monitoring log-in attempts

items.title: Password Management (Addressable)
items.description: Procedures for creating, changing, and safeguarding passwords

structure.title: Physical Safeguards
structure.description: Physical measures, policies, and procedures to protect electronic systems and buildings

items.title: Facility Access Controls
items.description: Implement policies to limit physical access to electronic information systems

items.title: Contingency Operations (Addressable)
items.description: Procedures for facility access during emergencies

items.title: Facility Security Plan (Addressable)
items.description: Policies to safeguard facility and equipment

items.title: Access Control and Validation (Addressable)
items.description: Procedures to control and validate access based on role

items.title: Maintenance Records (Addressable)
items.description: Document repairs and modifications to physical security

items.title: Workstation Use
items.description: Implement policies for proper workstation use
questions: Is physical access to workstations controlled?

items.title: Device and Media Controls
items.description: Implement policies for the receipt and removal of hardware and electronic media
items.summary: Control devices and media containing ePHI

items.title: Disposal (Required)
items.description: Policies for final disposition of ePHI and hardware

items.title: Media Re-use (Required)
items.description: Procedures for removal of ePHI before media reuse

items.title: Accountability (Addressable)
items.description: Maintain record of hardware and media movements

items.title: Data Backup and Storage (Addressable)
items.description: Create retrievable exact copy of ePHI before movement

structure.title: Technical Safeguards
structure.description: Technology and policies for controlling access to ePHI

items.title: Access Control
items.description: Implement technical policies to allow only authorized access to ePHI

items.title: Unique User Identification (Required)
items.description: Assign unique name/number for tracking user identity

items.title: Emergency Access Procedure (Required)
items.description: Procedures for obtaining necessary ePHI during emergencies

items.title: Automatic Logoff (Addressable)
items.description: Implement electronic procedures to terminate sessions after inactivity

items.title: Encryption and Decryption (Addressable)
items.description: Implement mechanism to encrypt and decrypt ePHI

items.title: Audit Controls
items.description: Implement hardware, software, and procedures to record and examine system activity

items.title: Transmission Security
items.description: Implement technical security measures to guard against unauthorized access during transmission

items.title: Integrity Controls (Addressable)
items.description: Implement security measures to ensure ePHI is not improperly modified

items.title: Encryption (Addressable)
items.description: Implement mechanism to encrypt ePHI when transmitted
